quotes.quote: The further you get away from yourself, the more challenging it is. Not to be in your comfort zone is great fun.
There is a comfort zone of knowing where things are going and having characters in place, but the action gets more and more dramatic and is very challenging to describe.
Comfort controls us. Fear scares us. To grow you have to overcome fear and go out of your comfort zone to be what you always wanted to be.
Blossoming out through one's comfort zone should be well meaning so as to achieve newer levels of excellence.
Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
To the degree we're not living our dreams, our comfort zone has more control of us than we have over ourselves.
People tend to play in their comfort zone, so the best things are achieved in a state of surprise, actually.
When you go out of your comfort zone and it works there's nothing more satisfying.
To change a team you must change their comfort zone.
Your comfort zone is not a place that you want to remain in. Dare, discover, be all that you can be.
A dream is your creative vision for your life in the future. You must break out of your current comfort zone and become comfortable with the unfamiliar and the unknown.
It's good for me to do things outside my comfort zone and push myself.
Life always begins with one step outside of your comfort zone.
I love going out of my comfort zone-I live to go out of my comfort zone. Obviously, you have quieter years than others-you don't go jumping out of a plane every day.
Each one of us has a comfort zone. The problem comes when we are unwilling to leave it.Always remember that, every time you step out of your comfort zone, you step into God's comfort zone.
Nothing profound ever happens in your life when you remain in your comfort zone.
As you move outside of your comfort zone, what was once the unknown and frightening becomes your new normal.
Comfort zones are plush lined coffins. When you stay in your plush lined coffins, you die.
Your comfort zone is a place where you keep yourself in a self-illusion and nothing can grow there but your potentiality can grow only when you can think and grow out of that zone.
Life begin at the end of your Comfort Zone. So if you`re feeling uncomfortable right now, know that the change taking place in your life is a begining, not an ending.
To succeed in life, we must stay within our strength zone but continually move outside our comfort zone.
Coming out of your comfort zone is tough in the beginning, chaotic in the middle, and awesome in the endâ€¦because in the end, it shows you a whole new world.
The only thing that is stopping you from where you are to where you want to go is your comfort zone.

If you want to be excellent at something, you must move away from your comfort zone, overcome doubt, setbacks and failure. Never give up. Keep plugging away and being persistent. One day, success will be yours.
Comfort zones are overrated. They make you lazy.
Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.
The best things in life are often waiting for you at the exit ramp of your comfort zone.
Comedians tend to find a comfort zone and stay there and do lamer versions of themselves for the rest of their career.
Step outside of your comfort zone and go beyond the boundaries that you and others have set for yourself.

Risk, then, is not just part of life. It is life. The place between your comfort zone and your dream is where life takes place. It's the high-anxiety zone, but it's also where you discover who you are.
Better to step out of your comfort zone, enjoy new experiences & not know what's coming your way, than stick to routines & be bored with the same end results.

My comfort zone is like a little bubble around me, and I've pushed it in different directions and made it bigger and bigger until these objectives that seemed totally crazy eventually fall within the realm of the possible.
Comfort zone has the most comfortable bed in life where dreams become alive in your mind but never become a reality because you never get up from bed to make it happen.
We have to be honest about what we want and take risks rather than lie to ourselves and make excuses to stay in our comfort zone.
The comfort zone is the great enemy of courage and confidence.
People are so ready to cut you down if you take a risk and leave your comfort zone.
Zone into your comfort zone, and, then zone into where you want to be. Be all that you can be.
Comfort is your biggest trap and coming out of comfort zone your biggest challenge.
The desire to live within our comfort zone and to be in control all the time is a denier of a fulfilling life that excites. Let go.
If you put yourself in a position where you have to stretch outside your comfort zone, then you are forced to expand your consciousness.

The comfort zone is a psychological state in which one feels familiar, safe, at ease, and secure. You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.
You should not remain in your comfort zone; if you want to make it big, you must challenge yourself, get out of your comfort zone, and succeed in doing well outside of your comfort areas.
In the long run, our comfort zone becomes our uncomfortable zone.
Comfort zones are most often expanded through discomfort.
Sometimes we have to step out of our comfort zones. We have to break the rules. And we have to discover the sensuality of fear. We need to face it, challenge it, dance with it.
The stage is my comfort zone, and playing live is what I've always wanted to do. It's why I want to do two hundred dates a year. I wouldn't feel that way if I were nervous onstage.
The comfort zone is always the most desirable place to be. But in settling for comfort, there is a price to pay and it comes in the death of ambition, of hope, of youth and the death of self.
Each one of us has a comfort zone. The problem comes when we are unwilling to leave it.
To get better you have to step out of your comfort zone. You can't do the same things you've always done & improve.
The comfort zone takes our greatest aspirations and turns them into excuses for not bothering to aspire.
